name: The Stone of Tears
data: It decreases the users strength pitifully.
It decreases the users wisdom pitifully.
It increases the users intelligence strongly.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration tremendously.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'essence eye'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'quick chant'.
